groundTruth.21: Why did you remove these items from the main menu? I think they should be in both places. Note that it would be nice if these were disabled when the focus is not in an inline editor, but I think that's a separate issue.

generated_comments.21: {"code_review_suggestion":"By removing the Quick Edit prev/next match menu items, the shortcuts become undiscoverable and may feel like a regression. Either retain at least one discoverability point (e.g., keep them in a submenu or tooltip) or remove/disable the underlying commands and update docs/changelog to avoid orphaned functionality."}
